item.title: Disable WiFi MAC Randomization on Samsung with Intune
item.description: Why disable MAC Randomization? In some scenarios setting static IP Addresses for mobile devices is a requirement (such as EPOS, Kiosks, Meeting Room Self-Service Tablets etc.

item.title: Getting Started with Samsung Knox for Enterprise
item.description: What is Samsung Knox? Samsung Knox is a service made up of a number of solutions such as Knox Mobile Enrollment and Knox Platform for Enterprise.

item.title: Create Dynamic Application Packages with PowerShell
item.description: Dynamic? In what way? When I say the packages are dynamic, I mean that you don’t have to update the application package when a new version is released by the vendor.

item.title: Deploy Windows Subsystem for Linux
item.description: What is the Windows Susbsystem for Linux? As per the Microsoft Documentation, The Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) is a new Windows 10 feature that enables you to run native Linux command-line tools directly on Windows, alongside your traditional Windows desktop and modern store apps.

item.title: Creating Intune Win32 Apps
item.description: Win32 Apps, What Are they? If you’re familiar with Configuration Manager/MEMCM then think of these files as your source directory, the difference being you are effectively zipping it up and then uploading to Intune.

item.title: Finding Microsoft Graph API's from the Web
item.description: Why do I need to find these? Welcome (Back) to another post about the graph API’s, This time it isn’t so much about rambling through documentation but about giving you a nice handy tip on your route to finding what API is been called when browsing in the Web Console.

item.title: Enrol Devices to Autopilot (Unattended)

item.title: Breaking Down Custom OMA-URI (CSP) Policies
item.description: What is an OMA-URI Policy? Meaning: Open Mobile Alliance Uniform Resource Identifier Traditionally when you implement a new piece of software which contains Group Policy Objects (GPO’s) to customise the feature of the application you would import the .
